title: To serve the mind
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Stanley Jackson
brief_description: The dramatization of the sympathetic hospital treatment a general practitioner receives when he suffers a mental breakdown. There is an emphasis on the types of facilities available and on the wide variety of mental and emotional ailments which can be cured or alleviated with medical knowledge.
